DOC.brief_summary: Transdel Pharmaceuticals investigate topical cream formulation consist 10 % ketoprofen local treatment pain associate mild moderate acute soft tissue injury confirmatory Phase 3 trial .
DOC.brief_title: Ketoprofen 10 % Cream Treatment Pain Associated With Mild Moderate Acute Soft Tissue Injury
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 3 study examines use TDLP-110 ( a.k.a . KetotransdelÂ® ketoprofen 10 % cream ) , topical treatment pain associate mild moderate acute soft tissue injury upper low extremity serve confirmatory trial . The first complete Phase 3 study show efficacy safety TDLP-110 compare placebo improve patient assessment pain .

Female patient childbearing potential must practice abstinence use medically acceptable form contraception Have diagnosis uncomplicated acute soft tissue injury upper low extremity , include acute injury ligament , tendon , muscle ( include Grade 1 Grade 2 sprain strain ) , occur within 60 hour precede baseline visit . Meet pain intensity criterion Are willing discontinue use pain medication treatment provide part study . Participation previous clinical study drug TDLP110 ( ketoprofen 10 % cream ) . Are pregnant lactating . Have Grade 3 sprain strain , bilateral sprain strain , concomitant fracture open wound site sprain strain , serious injury , determine investigator Have shoulder ( rotator cuff ) injury . Have treat sprain strain site within past 3 month . Have contusion site acute soft tissue injury intend treatment . Have active skin lesion disease intend site application study medication . Have pharmacologic treatment injury le 24 hour baseline assessment Use oral parenteral corticosteroid within 30 day injury . Have nonpharmacologic treatment injury rest , ice , compression , and/or elevation ( RICE ) within 12 hour prior baseline visit . Have history physical examination find incompatible safe participation study . Have history physical examination finding , opinion investigator , incompatible study product use obtain interpretable data . Are take medication substance contraindicate due nature study medication potential drug interaction . Are allergic sensitive soy lecithin soy lecithincontaining product . Are take probenecid similar drug may significantly affect renal function . Are take sleep medication , sedative hypnotic , anxiolytic , antidepressant medication dose stable least 2 month . Are receive physical therapy index injury Have schedule elective surgery invasive procedure period study participation .
